ygData.subject: War and the horsmen show a new trick
ygData.msgSnippet: War looked at the body of the Kit Kat. He screamed as loud as he could. In pure anquish the horsmen looked on. They shall pay. They shall pay dearly.

Subject: War and the horsmen show a new trick

 War looked at the body of the Kit Kat. He screamed as loud as he could. In 
pure anquish the horsmen looked on. "They shall pay. They shall pay dearly."
